name: Contact
htmlContent: For any information please contact us through the email m.weiland@radien.io

name: radien - Email change confirmation
htmlContent:
An email change has been requested from your account:

Current email: $currentEmail$
New email: $newEmail$

To apply this change, click this link within the next 5 minutes.

name: radien - GDRP Art. 15 - Right of Access Confirmation
htmlContent:
Dear $firstName$ $lastName$,
If you requested your personal data from $portalUrl$, please click on the verify button below.
Ignore this email, if you did not request the data.
Confirmation

name: radien - Tenant Request
htmlContent:
Dear Administrator of $tenantName$,
user $firstName$ $lastName$ with UID $userId$ has requested access to $tenantName$ Tenant.
Please take required action in Approvals Page

name: radien - Tenant Assignment
htmlContent: Dear $firstName$ $lastName$, </br>You have been provided access to $tenantName$ Tenant with the following role(s): $roleList$.

name: radien - Tenant Request Not Approved
htmlContent:
Dear $firstName$ $lastName$,

You requested the tenant $tenantName$.
Unfortunately your request has been not been approved.

If you have further questions, please check together with your tenant's administrator.
Thank you.

Best regards,
$tenantName$ administrator.

name: radien - Data Alteration
htmlContent:
Dear User,

You have requested us to $operation$ your personal data in ra’di'en Platform. We have successfully $operation$ your personal data.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
Admin
